taskDescription: Look at the entire glycolysis pathway, and make a list of the kinds of organic reactions that take place—nucleophilic acyl substitutions, aldol reactions, E1cB reactions, and so forth.
detailedSolution: Steps 1, 3: Phosphate transfers; steps 2, 5, 8: isomerizations; step 4: retro-aldol reaction; step 5: oxidation and nucleophilic acyl substitution; steps 7, 10: phosphate transfers; step 9: E1cB dehydration
